properties.name: terra.ai.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the Terra AI module.

properties.name: terra.ai.deepseek.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable DeepSeek model integration.

properties.name: terra.ai.deepseek.base-url
properties.description: The base URL for the DeepSeek API.

properties.name: terra.ai.deepseek.api-key
properties.description: API key for the DeepSeek service.

properties.name: terra.ai.deepseek.chat.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the DeepSeek chat model.

properties.name: terra.ai.deepseek.chat.options.model
properties.description: The model name to use for chat completion.

properties.name: terra.ai.deepseek.chat.options.temperature
properties.description: Controls randomness. Lower values make the model more deterministic.

properties.name: terra.ai.deepseek.embedding.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the DeepSeek embedding model.

properties.name: terra.ai.deepseek.embedding.options.model
properties.description: The model name to use for embeddings.

properties.name: terra.ai.vector-store.type
properties.description: The type of vector store to use. Supported values: 'in-memory', 'redis'.

properties.name: terra.ai.memory.type
properties.description: The type of conversation memory to use. Supported values: 'in-memory'.

properties.name: terra.ai.memory.max-history
properties.description: The maximum number of recent conversation exchanges to keep.
